question: The 2019 MENA World Economic Forum was held in which of the following countries?
explanation: The World Economic Forum (WEF) in the Middle East and North Africa (MENA) 2019 was held at the Dead Sea in Jordan on April 6 to 7. The 17th WEF meeting in the region called for united efforts to address the most pressing challenges of the area. It was themed on three major visions: generating job opportunities, empowering Arab women and promoting the most intriguing startups that have joined the regionâ€™s industry over the past years. Over 1,000 government, business and civil society leaders from more than 50 countries participated in the summit.
